messages.title: My local priorities
messages.content: Working Hard For You: Thurrock Council figures show I have put in more casework and helped more people in Thurrock than both Tory MPs combined. Fighting New Thames Crossing: No more Crossings in Thurrock. Put it elsewhere. Thurrock has had enough. It will bring more traffic and more pollution. Tackle The Housing Crisis: Thurrock residents should be put first in the housing queue. We need to reduce migration to ease pressure on the housing stock.

messages.title: Our national priorities
messages.content: Control & Cut Migration: On 5th April, only UKIP MEPs voted to stop unlimited migration after Brexit. The Tories and Labour want to continue free movement. The Brexit You Voted For: 72% of people in Thurrock voted to leave the EU. The Tory MP voted to Remain in the EU. Please support me to get a Brexit MP. Defend Our NHS: I will fight the Tory cuts to our NHS including the proposed ending of services at Orsett Hospital. Thurrock needs a new hospital.

On 5th April, only UKIP MEPs voted to stop unlimited migration after Brexit. The Tories and Labour want to continue free movement.
72% of people in Thurrock voted to leave the EU. The Tory MP voted to Remain in the EU. Please support the candidate to get a Brexit MP.
